ygData.subject: Re: making money (was: wis items)
ygData.msgSnippet: There was a great little business on Fennin Ro called, Rokk and Rhunes Emporium, hehe.  These 2 Ogres had this business going in Cazic doing the very same
ygData.messageBody:
There was a great little business on Fennin Ro called, Rokk and Rhunes
Emporium, hehe. These 2 Ogres had this business going in Cazic doing the
very same thing. At least one of them was there everyday. They had to have
made tremendous amounts of cash there. It is very time consuming and takes
aways from the hunt quite a bit, but it is an easy way to make cash.
I also just recently noticed that there is a travelling person in South
Karana now, he starts out at the Bridge, announcing to the zone he is there
to change their money for them from Copper to silver, gold, etc... He then
travels to different set locations, Centaurs, aviaks, etc... advertising as
he goes. I'm not sure how successful he is but seems like it would be
profittable.

Bree
